verbs.description: With a pledge to [V: save] [ARG1: a major Chinese company] [ARG2: from crippling US sanctions] , President Trump has delivered yet another twist in the trade clash with Beijing .
With a pledge to save [ARG0: a major Chinese company] from [V: crippling] [ARG1: US sanctions] , President Trump has delivered yet another twist in the trade clash with Beijing .
With a pledge to save a major Chinese company from crippling US sanctions , President Trump [V: has] delivered yet another twist in the trade clash with Beijing .
[ARGM-ADV: With a pledge to save a major Chinese company from crippling US sanctions] , [ARG0: President Trump] has [V: delivered] [ARG1: yet another twist in the trade clash with Beijing] .
